sourcesContent:
Accepted Payments
{["Cash", "Debit", "Credit"].map((method, index) => (
setFormData((prev) => { const updatedPayments = [...prev.acceptedPayments]; if (e.target.checked) { updatedPayments[index] = { method, fee: 0 }; // Add the payment method } else { updatedPayments[index] = null; // Remove the payment method } return { ...prev, acceptedPayments: updatedPayments }; }) } /> {(method === "Debit" || method === "Credit") && formData.acceptedPayments[index] && ( $ handlePaymentFeeChange(index, e.target.value.slice(0, 2))} /> )}
))}
